Every folder from hear contain one folder for every states of the game that handle inputs
Each folder contains two config files : - One for the supported KEYS
										- One for the ACTIONS caused by the previous keys

										
WHAT DO THE FOLDERS NAMES REPRESENT ?
For each folder, its name correspond to the NAME of the controller + the vendor ID + the product ID. Then,

'Wireless Controller_1356_2508' stands for the PS4 Controller.
